name: RetroFix AI
headline: Turbo Tax for Building Rebates
description: RetroFix is a web platform that allows contractors to automatically apply for tax incentives and sustainability credits. Currently, contractors rarely apply for credits because discovering incentives, checking eligibility, and applying are all done manually via emails and phone calls with local utilities and/or government offices. RetroFix consolidates information on government incentives and allows building managers/contractors to apply in minutes, saving hundreds of thousands of dollars per building.

founders.name: Isaac Toscano, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder/CEO at RetroFix AI. Before Retrofix I studied Materials Engineering at MIT, made financial models for billion dollar companies, did solar cell research at MIT's Nano lab and spend the weekends drilling Muay Thai.

founders.name: Daniel Portela, Co-Founder, CTO
founders.description: Co-Founder, CTO @ RetroFix AI | MIT CS | üáµüá∑

# Maximize Building Rebates
Find and apply for tailored grants and incentives to transform your building's energy use
[Backed byCombinator](https://www.retrofix.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)[Built by engineers from![MIT Logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/0c/MIT_logo.svg)](https://www.retrofix.ai/<https:/www.mit.edu/>)
# Get Early Access
RetroFix is currently in early-access, but we'd love to work with you. Tell us about what you'd like to use our platform for and we can get you started!
Submit
## Product Demo
##### Upload in progress...
Your video file is being uploaded. The currently loaded video is the source file.
## We automate your building rebates
We provide contractors with the ability to streamline multiple incentive applications to ensure their projects receive the maximum amount of available subsidies. We worry about your rebates, so you can focus on your client.
### Old Way
### After RetroFix
### Time-consuming research
Hours spent on calls and emails to understand complex rebate programs.
### Expensive consultant reports
High costs for custom energy efficiency reports and improvement recommendations.
### Limited incentive access
Difficulty applying for multiple incentives due to changing rules and verbose program manuals.
### Complex application process
Navigating complex utility websites, manually handling documents, and submitting applications through outdated portals.
### Instant AI assistance
Get immediate, accurate answers about rebate programs from our specialized AI.
### Quick, affordable reports
Generate comprehensive reports on our platform using local data and AI analysis.
### Maximized incentive stacking
We find and stack the most relevant incentives for your project to get you back the most money possible.
### Streamlined applications
Apply for multiple incentives directly through our platform, we handle the paperwork and submissions.
Old WayAfter RetroFix
### Time-consuming research
Hours spent on calls and emails to understand complex rebate programs.
### Expensive consultant reports
High costs for custom energy efficiency reports and improvement recommendations.
### Limited incentive access
Difficulty applying for multiple incentives due to changing rules and verbose program manuals.
### Complex application process
Navigating complex utility websites, manually handling documents, and submitting applications through outdated portals.
## Frequently Asked Questions
### What problem are we solving?
### Are you helping me find more than one incentive for my project?
### Who should be using our platform?
### Why should I care about rebates?
### What do you do that I can't do myself?
### What equipment can you help me look for incentives?
### What incentives can I apply for on your platform?
### Are you accepting new customers?

generated_description:
**RetroFix AI: Revolutionizing Tax Rebates for Building Contractors**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, RetroFix AI is poised to transform the way contractors engage with tax incentives and sustainability credits. Think of them as ‚ÄúTurboTax for Building Rebates.‚Äù The company, part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, aims to automate and simplify the process of finding and applying for various tax incentives, allowing contractors to save time and money‚Äîpotentially hundreds of thousands of dollars per project.

**The Problem They Solve**
Traditionally, contractors faced cumbersome hurdles when trying to access tax credits and sustainability incentives. The process could involve endless calls and emails, deciphering complex eligibility criteria, and navigating outdated application systems. RetroFix AI addresses these issues head-on by consolidating vital information about government incentives into one streamlined platform.

**What They Offer**
RetroFix AI provides a robust solution for contractors by offering:
- **Instant AI Assistance**: Get quick, accurate answers regarding rebate programs.
- **Affordable Reporting**: Generate crucial reports easily using local data and AI analysis.
- **Maximized Incentives**: The platform identifies and stacks applicable rebates, ensuring the maximum savings for each project.
- **Streamlined Applications**: Easily apply for multiple incentives through a single, user-friendly interface.

In short, RetroFix takes the headache out of rebate applications, letting contractors focus on their core work while the platform handles paperwork and submissions.

**Team and Leadership**
With a lean team of two employees, RetroFix AI is still in its early-access phase but is eager to collaborate with potential users. Gustaf Alstromer, a Y Combinator partner, lends his expertise and network to guide the company in its mission to expand and refine its offerings.

**Conclusion**
RetroFix AI is tackling a crucial niche in the building and sustainability sector. By leveraging artificial intelligence to simplify tax incentive applications for contractors, they‚Äôre not just streamlining processes‚Äîthey're enabling a paradigm shift in how these rebates are accessed. If you're a contractor looking to maximize your project‚Äôs financial efficiency, RetroFix could be the partner you've been searching for. For more information, visit [retrofix.ai](https://www.retrofix.ai/).
